messages.content: how to plant a neem tree

Neem trees prefer warm temperatures and well-drained soil.  London's current temperature is suitable for planting, but ensure the soil drains well to prevent root rot.  Choose a sunny location sheltered from strong winds.  Follow instructions on your specific neem tree sapling for planting depth and spacing.  Water thoroughly after planting.  Note that neem trees can grow large, so consider its mature size before choosing a planting location.
